title: (x) Thin "Free Free Super Music Maker" geometric sans - Futura (customized) {Yves}
content:
Looking for the font used in this cover. It looks almost like Futura, except for the slanted A and M. Any help appreciated.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [freefree.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828001518/http:/typophile.com/files/freefree.jpg) | 127.35 KB |

 [‹ (x) MasterCard logo - custom face based on Frutiger {Patrick Witmer}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828001518/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40500 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Balance Books logo serif - Mrs Eaves {Tiff} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828001518/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40477 "Go to next forum topic")
author: soundboz

comments.content: This is a customized Futura. You’ll have to go at it yourself.

Wow, speedy response.

Thank you for your help.
